{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=NTV300 |upc=606449087345 |asin=B0092U3TKC |fcc_date=08/29/2012 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |availability=now |type=media streamer |fcc_id=PY312200198 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT8633;MT8633FDAG; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR-BC |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63BFR-H9C |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5370 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=HDMI |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|NeoTV 2 Streaming Player}} :[http://www.netgear.com/home/products/hometheater/media-players/NTV300.aspx Product page]
"48.JP71I.OGA" and "2012/07/10" appears to be silkscreened on the board. :[[Wistron NeWeb]] Corp. ([[WNC]]) is presumed to be the OEM.
*[http://www.devttys0.com/2012/10/jailbreaking-the-neotv/ ''Jailbreaking the NeoTV'' on '''devttys0''']
